acem_prim_phys_0001.text: FRC is determined by the balance of outward chest wall recoil and inward lung recoil. In healthy adults, lung elastic recoil primarily sets FRC.

acem_prim_path_0001.text: Apoptosis features DNA fragmentation into nucleosomal ladders and no inflammation. Necrosis causes swelling and membrane rupture.

sources.title: Don't Forget The Bubbles – Cell Death

acem_prim_pharm_0001.text: Half-life (t½) ≈ 0.693 × Vd / CL. For Vd 40 L and CL 4 L/h → t½ ≈ 6.9 h.

acem_prim_anat_0001.text: The radial nerve winds around the humerus in the spiral groove and is vulnerable in humeral shaft fractures.
